name: Core Legends
description:
Core Legends is a game created by Darman & Griel Entertainment.

"Core Legends, a free-to-play* game where legendary challengers fight for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier."

**(If you run into any bugs let me know so we can squash them)**
